If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Equally inspired by haute couture and adventurous streetwear, Manchester-based Glamorous provides a forward take on global trends. Following the tenet that fashion should be individual, accessible, and affordable, their collections of contemporary closet staples offer a playful assortment of mix-and-match pieces designed to suit any personality or occasion.
